30 (er, 20) Days to Success

December 12th, 2008 · 3 Comments

There are 20 more days in 2008.  You’ve been putting it off for too long so try something new every day for the next 20 days.  What are you going to do?

I’m giving up coffee and sweets and running every day.  Not much time left to get fit for the Big Day!

30 Days to Success.
